DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate response rate , response duration , survival patient treat CC-5013 chronic dosing schedule versus syncopate dose schedule .
DOC.brief_title: A Phase II Study Continuous Versus Syncopated Dosing CC-5013 Treatment Refractory Multiple Myeloma
DOC.criteria: History histologically document multiple myeloma relapse resistant disease Pregnant nursing woman may participate . Women childbearing potential must negative pregnancy document within one week registration . Women reproductive potential may participate unless agree use effective contraceptive method . Signed write informed consent willingness meet followup schedule study procedure obligation
